actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare should formulate and promulgate regulations governing all research involving recombinant DNA.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare should, by April 30, 1977, publish in the Federal Register proposed regulations governing all research involving recombinant DNA.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare should formulate and promulgate regulations governing all research involving recombinant DNA.
